title: Overall Training Procedure of RLC

definitions.Evaluation prompt: A prompt used to evaluate the language model's output
definitions.Reward: The feedback given to the language model to improve its performance

formulas: The solid lines represent the data flow, while the dashed line represents the update of LM parameters.
summary: The slide outlines the three-step training procedure of the Reinforcement Learning Classifier (RLC). It involves generating answers to unlabeled questions, self-evaluating the language model using an evaluation prompt, and updating the language model to maximize the reward using reinforcement learning algorithms. The slide also includes a diagram illustrating the data flow and the update process of the language model parameters.
